ygData.subject: Re: Thanks
ygData.msgSnippet: I highly recommend meeting with the folks of Mystic Alliance.  I joined them about 3 weeks ago and have had a wonderful time. Wonderful bunch of people and the
ygData.messageBody:
I highly recommend meeting with the folks of Mystic Alliance. I
joined them about 3 weeks ago and have had a wonderful time.

Wonderful bunch of people and the last guild event I attended was a
hoot.

Everyone I have had dealings with and interaction with have been
welcoming and friendly and helpful. I actually find myself wanting to
level faster so I can get closer to their levels so I can group with
them more. And yes, there are some of us who like bears in MA....and
some of us who ARE bears (g)

Ciao!

Alaindar - Half Elf Ranger
Member Mystic Alliance

(Dick Lauder in RL)


--- In EQ_rainbow@y..., Deanir Der'Kleriker <deanir@y...> wrote:
> Just wanted to send a note out thanking the people in
> the Ordo Ursi Prismatus guild for bringing me into the
> group and making me feel welcome.
>
> Some of my friends visited the Rodcet Nife server and
> found the Mystic Alliance, I hope to make it over
> there this evening. Looking forward to meeting
> everyone online.
>
> Deanir - 7th Hammer Cleric (39)
> Deanir - Lanys Shamman (3)
> -Barry
>
